title: Update workshop language for non-developer audience
description:
The workshop is intended for non-developers. Review and update all verbiage across the project to be accessible to people without coding experience.

Files to Review:
- AGENTS.md - Update terminology, simplify technical jargon  
- README.md - Simplify getting started instructions
- slides/index.html - Make slide content accessible
- docs/README.md - Ensure documentation is beginner-friendly

Guidelines:
- Replace 'developers' with 'participants' or 'learners'
- Add brief explanations for technical terms
- Use plain language over jargon
- Focus on what you will accomplish rather than technical details
- Assume no prior experience with AI, command line, or programming
